sections.title: Acceptance
sections.content: All three EW prototypes were inferior to Y70+ mean thermometer. Top 2 box Purchase Interest showed no significant differences across prototype types themselves.

content.description: Although both the CT/21mm filter and Camel blend/21mm were both partly similar to Select, Camel was closest to the ideal. The 21mm prototype was inferior to all other products due to its lack of strength.
CT/21mm was partly with Select while Camel and CT/21 were inferior - did not have enough tobacco taste.
Camel burned parity with Select while CT prototypes burned too quickly.
